findings.title: Missing signer check
findings.description: If an instruction should only be available to a restricted set of entities, the program should verify that the call has been signed by the appropriate entity.

findings.title: Missing overflow check
findings.description: The addition operation is missing an overflow check, if the value overflows, an error should be thrown.

findings.title: Errors should be more specific
findings.description: There is only one error struct and the same error is returned in every case scenario.

findings.title: Address not guaranteed to be a valid program address
findings.description: The address generated using create_program_address is not guaranteed to be a valid program address off the curve. Program addresses does not lie on the ed25519 curve and therefore has no valid private key associated with it, and thus generating a signature for it is impossible.

findings.title: Redundant code
findings.description: The contract contains redundant code which can lead to unnecessary gas consumption and potential security vulnerabilities.
